summary: I present to you a better expirience with the backshelves companion Uthgerd
descriptionHtml:
I see a ton of overhauls for the somewhat already good looking followers like Jordis, Lydia etc. ,
but i was having a hard time finding replacements for the \\\"second hand\\\" followers, so I decided to make my own changes. The result looks surprisingly good and I thought i might share it. The Skyrim NPC Editor is so fun and easy to use.I am using the UNP body but I reckon it doesn\\\'t affect the face anyway. The face mods i have installed are:
Bella\\\'s Better Females with Makeup Version 1 and No Shine extra patches
Cowerwomen look 3
TS Femafe Face Tattoos volume 6
ApachiHair latest version

P.S I might have some mods for other parts of the face like lips, eyes etc. but i don\\\'t have NMM installed and i can\\\'t keep track of what mods i\\\'ve downloaded, so if your Uthgerd doesn\\\'t look like the one in the screenshot , chances are i have additional textures that i don\\\'t remember, but they should all be available in the skyrim nexus.
author: Quoth
